name: blunt-instrument-eval
description: Instruments code with blunt-instrument and runs it.

scripts.build:cjs: BABEL_MODULES=cjs babel src/ --out-dir target/cjs/ --ignore src/**/*.test.js --root-mode upward
scripts.build:esm: BABEL_MODULES=false babel src/ --out-dir target/esm/ --ignore src/**/*.test.js --root-mode upward
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm

author: Jacob Williams <jacobaw@gmail.com> (https://brokensandals.net)
